response.overview: It is 2002 in Pamplona, and the left-wing nationalist organization Segi has just been declared illegal. Urko is a member of this youth organization, along with Jone, his best friend. Urko divides his life between the public and the private. In public, he is an exemplary militant and a worker. In private, he satisfies his hidden desires in the menâ€™s toilets at the bus station and in dark corners of the Taconera. His social and political life will become completely entangled with his sexual life. This situation will affect his relationships and decisions, calling everything around him into question.
response.title: Ilunabarrean Esan
